name: plansewalker-primer-backend
description: Backend API for Planeswalker's Primer - MTG rulebook for beginners

scripts.test:db: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const { Pool } = require('pg'); const pool = new Pool({ connectionString: process.env.DATABASE_URL }); pool.query('SELECT NOW()').then(() => { console.log('Database connection successful'); process.exit(0); }).catch(err => { console.error('Database connection failed:', err.message); process.exit(1); });"
